content: Dan, what a powerful, poignant, wise piece honoring your grandfather. The fact that he played soldier with you in such a committed, earnest way — that he played with you at all, and enjoyed it — tells me so much about his delightful imagination, his love, and the pleasure he took just being with you. This is rare. He is a rare grandfather. You are both lucky. Your letter keeps those memories alive, as you write. Thank you.
